title: Determining the LSRL From Summary Statistics
question_text:
A nutritionist wanted to investigate the relationship between the number of fat grams ($x$) and the total number of calories ($y$) found in foods offered at fast-food restaurants. She randomly selected $16$ food items found at local fast food restaurants and gathered information about these food items from the nutritional information provided by the restaurants, Here are some statistics related to her findings:
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.
If the correlation for the relationship between number of fat grams and total number of calories is $0.947$, what is the equation of the LSRL?
